column5: Hey guys, I'm new to the board, my name is Marius and I have a question that I hope someone can help me with, I'm going to Hanover, Ontario tomorrow morning and I will have some time to do some fishing but I have never been there and don't know any places where I can fish from shore, Any help would be much appreciated, Thanks
Welcome To the Board The answer is no where the season is closed til the Trout opener end of April, Pike 2nd Saturday in May and Bass End of June. Richard
OOOOHHHHH, I thought I read "hangover fishing".......Been there done that and it aint fun!  Welcome to THE board!!
theres no shores there...just banks...and they ain't open
Wilmer Ponds near Durham has nice trout.
Wilmer ponds does have nice trout rainbows and browns and very reasonable price to fish there. Marcus you could hunt down some pan fish if ya really want crappie seem to be getting active.
